title: Bi-Weekly Gaming Discussion Thread
selftext:
What are you playing, r/India? Let us use this thread to discuss any games we're playing, have played or are going to play. (Mobile and board games included!)

What game are you looking forward to? Are you a developer? Show us your wares!

Please don't just list the names of games as your entire post, make sure to write a word or two about the games.

Check out r/IndianGaming! They are an active community and also host a few co-op sessions.

**The Gaming Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings.**

https://preview.redd.it/xagdqefyv8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=f975f1c3093a3d9598a1da39854b03d1250bd55d
comments: Playing Crash Team Racing. I haven't had this much fun in a long time.
Grinding the ranked ladder on age of empires 2 de, finally reached 1300 elo.
Nier Replicant. Absolute masterpiece of a game.
Awesome! I'm so hyped for AOE 4
Wow, a Chelsea fan and aoe2 player. Are you me?

Ok l play some mobile games 
Call of duty mobile for the competitive part where it’s really fun when you have a friend or two or being part of a clan also makes you have a great time in it.
Recently I have also got into playing Genshin impact. As a child who played a lot of pokemon games,this game do bring a lot of memories for me from having an excitement in exploring things. Such a good game with amazing graphics. 
Sky is also another rpg game where you explore alot of things with a calm background not only in game graphics but also the music.

These 3 games can be said how far we reached in the department of gaming in mobiles

I've discovered the biggest drawback to VR gaming:

Having two large and clingy dogs haha, everytime I make room to use my Quest 2 with my pc, they lie down in the middle and greatly decrease my chances of making it to middle age.

Also, QHD 144hz monitors have gotten surprisingly cheap, I just wish my gpu could handle it, but I still look at the prices of 3060s and above and begin crying.
Mostlly still stuck on Destiny 2, also picked up hades and now I'm addicted
Any apex legends ps4 players here?
any smash players here, check out https://www.youtube.com/user/HauntedLittleFighter
Death stranding on ps4. On the side replaying Ghost of Tsushima just because I love it so much.
